description: IPG Photonics Corporation is the leader in high-power �ber lasers and ampli�ers used primarily in materials processing and other diverse applications. The Company's mission is to make its �ber laser technology the tool of choice in mass production. IPG accomplishes this mission by delivering superior performance, reliability and usability at a lower total cost of ownership compared with other types of lasers and non-laser tools, allowing end users to increase productivity and decrease costs.
